alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 08 at 6:41PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 2 to 6 inches possible, with 6 to 12 inches possible over the Madison and Gallatin ranges and in the West Yellowstone area. Winds could gust over 50 mph at times. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
